member.name: T:BankExample.BankAccount
member.summary: Static class that represents simple bank account

member.name: F:BankExample.BankAccount._balance
member.summary: This private field holds current account balance.

member.name: M:BankExample.BankAccount.Withdraw(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method subtracts given amount of money from .

member.name: M:BankExample.BankAccount.Deposit(System.Int32)

member.exception: When the amount is less than 0.
